items.sentence: Tom realized there were no cars parked in front of the school.
Tom said he didn\'t want to tell Mary about what had happened.
Perfectionists find it harder to function than average people.
I thought you said you\'d like to know why Tom had to do that.
I tried to convince myself that I hadn\'t done anything wrong.
I doubt that Tom would ever consider asking Mary to marry him.
I doubt that Tom would ever consider driving such a small car.
I have the feeling that we\'re forgetting something important.
Tom didn\'t have to tell me if he didn\'t want to, but he did.
I\'m still not too old to become a world-famous tennis player.
